title: @Riot: Do you guys have deadlines?
body:
If so why do you guys have deadlines?

I ask because during the assassin rework the person working on it, 21CentuaryFaux I believe said he was kinda disappointed with how LeBlanc Q -> passive combo turned out. I believe he was more disappointed with the animation (maybe how it worked) and how it was very similar to Ryze's E. He mentioned something about how "It's kinda late to change", or something along the lines of "I wish I noticed it sooner". So that is why I'm asking.

replies.body:
It's unlikely a member of the teams that work on the gameplay and balance changes will see this post on Help & Support. I recommend submitting this question to the [Ask Riot page](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so it has a higher chance of getting seen or answered by those who directly work with reworks.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
